title: Activists say Trump’s first 100 days mark setback for civil rights
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's first 100 days in office has sparked concerns he is rolling back decades of civil rights protections.

title: Trump's first 100 days: Millions in crypto profits
shortDescription: Trump returned to the White House days after launching a cryptocurrency meme coin that analysts say is now worth a fortune.

title: Australia's Albanese claims election victory, riding anti-Trump wave
shortDescription: Supporters at Labor’s election party in Sydney cheered and hugged each other as Albanese claimed victory and said his party would form a majority government.

title: Trump thinks ESPN host should run for president. Dems aren't so sure.
shortDescription: The 57-year-old "First Take" host knows how to create a buzz, but progressives activists and voters are skeptical about embracing bombastic celebrity

title: White House posts image of Trump dressed as the pope
shortDescription: The White House on Friday posted an image of President Donald Trump dressed as the pope on X, sparking both backlash and glee online.

title: Judge strikes down Trump order against law firm Perkins Coie
shortDescription: U.S. District Judge Beryl Howell's ruling was the first deciding the legal merits of any of the several directives Trump has aimed at law firms.

title: Trump proposes $44 billion boost in Homeland Security budget
shortDescription: The president's plan would increase Homeland Security spending by two-third for one year.

title: White House budget proposal slashes NASA money
shortDescription: A budget proposal from the White House could reduce NASA's budget by about $6 billion, or 25%.

title: Top Republican senators criticize Trump's proposed military budget
shortDescription: The senators say the one-time increase won't have the lasting effect of a permanent addition to the defense budget.

title: NY group files lawsuit, asks Trump to stop sinking of SS United States
shortDescription: A suit seeking to prevent Okaloosa County from turning the SS U.S. into an artificial reef says preserving the ship honors "American greatness."

title: Judge drops case against Va. man branded ms-13 leader by Trump admin
shortDescription: Top Trump administration officials touted his arrest, calling him a top MS-13 leader. They dropped the case but still seek to remove him.

title: Trump admin asks Supreme Court to let DOGE access Social Security data
shortDescription: A federal judge blocked DOGE access to data of millions of Americans after she found the Social Security Administration likely violated privacy law.

title: Trump administration agrees to settlement over killed Jan. 6 rioter
shortDescription: Lawyers for the Trump administration and the family of slain Jan. 6 rioter Ashli Babbitt said they have reached a settlement over her death.

title: White House planning Trump, Army parade
shortDescription: The White House is planning a massive military parade to celebrate the Army's 250th anniversary and President Donald Trump's 79th birthday.

title: Ketanji Brown Jackson: Trump's judge attacks 'designed to intimidate'
shortDescription: Supreme Court Justice Ketanji Brown Jackson did not mention Trump by name during remarks in Puerto Rico but spoke about 'the elephant in the room'

title: NASA's SLS moon rocket on chopping block in Trump's budget proposal
shortDescription: A budget proposal released on May 2 includes not only cuts to NASA's science budget, but an early end to its SLS moon rocket.

title: What to know about some Democrats' push in Congress to impeach Trump
shortDescription: Trump on Thursday said Republicans in Congress “should start to think” about expelling Democrats who are pushing impeachment efforts against him.

title: Army moving forward with plans for Trump birthday parade: report
shortDescription: A new report by the Associated Press indicates that a potential birthday parade for President Donald Trump would feature 6,600 soldiers.
